author's_name_(_зохиогч): AA CHI THU NO MON HAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(ZHES PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES KYIS MDZAD PA'I SMAN BLA'I 'PHO BA'I LHAN THABS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES RGYUD SMAD HA GDONG RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG @009B BRTZON 'GRUS KYIS BSKUL NGOR ZHVA SER BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED AA CHI THU NO MON HAN DU 'BOD PAS BYANG RVA SGRENG DU SBYAR, ,RGYAL BSTAN RIN CHEN DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, ,'GRO KUN BDE SKYID DPAL LA SPYOD PA'I PHYIR, ,BSOD NAMS KUN BSDUD GLING GI BLA BRANG NAS, ,CHOS SBYIN 'DZAD MED GANGG'A'I RGYUN 'DI SPEL, ,)
